ATTACHMENT ID: 12936366 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

A simple fix; all of the above tests now pass.
hagleitn ekoifman can you take a look?

can you explain what this is meant to accomplish?
There seem to be more changes than the title suggests.

Also,
"// Note: used in RenamePartitionDesc, not here." - new enums with comments like these - seems like a hack...

This allocates write ID for set location and update columns operations.
I also added a test for most alter table operations to make sure they don't run into the check.
There are no new enum values - the old enum values are a hack, I just added the comments notifying future generations that they are a hack... I added the comments while verifying all kinds of operations and seeing what enum values map to what.
